text: Q36. | Let G be a group and let a, b and c be elements of G, then select the incorrect statement (1) (ab) = (b)(a?) (In(a)i=a (III) if ab=ac then b=c (IV) if ba=ca then b=c (V) The equation ax = b has a unique solution in G (VI) The equation ya = b has a unique solution in G (A) I & IT only (B) Il & IV only (C)V, VIonly (D) All are correct
